mapper.select: SELECT e.ECOUNSELID, c.CODENAME AS csCategoryName, e.title, e.CREATEDAT, e.status FROM EMAILCOUNSEL e JOIN CODEDETAIL c ON e.GROUPCODE = c.GROUPCODE AND e.CSCATEGORY = c.code ORDER BY e.ECOUNSELID DESC OFFSET #{pageRequestDTO.offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageRequestDTO.size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT e.ECOUNSELID, c.CODENAME AS csCategoryName, e.title, e.CREATEDAT, e.status FROM EMAILCOUNSEL e JOIN CODEDETAIL c ON e.GROUPCODE = c.GROUPCODE AND e.CSCATEGORY = c.code
AND e.title LIKE '%' || #{pageRequestDTO.keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY e.ECOUNSELID DESC OFFSET #{pageRequestDTO.offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageRequestDTO.size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EMAILCOUNSEL
AND title LIKE '%' || #{pageRequestDTO.keyword} || '%'
